SEARCH
Package cz.itnetwork.service

Interface InvoiceService

All Known Implementing Classes:
InvoiceServiceImpl
public interface InvoiceService
Service interface for managing invoices within the system.

This interface defines the contract for operations related to invoices, including CRUD operations and statistics retrieval.

Since:
2024

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    InvoiceDTO
    addInvoice(InvoiceDTO invoiceDTO)
    Adds a new invoice to the system.
    InvoiceDTO
    getInvoiceById(long id)
    Retrieves a specific invoice by its unique identifier.
    List<InvoiceDTO>
    getInvoices(InvoiceFilter invoiceFilter)
    Retrieves a list of invoices based on the specified filter criteria.
    InvoiceStatisticDTO
    getInvoiceStatistics()
    Retrieves invoice statistics including the total amount for the current year, all-time total amount, and count of invoices.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void>
    removeInvoiceById(long id)
    Removes an invoice from the system by its unique identifier.

    Updates an existing invoice with new details.

  • Method Details

    • addInvoice

      InvoiceDTO addInvoice(InvoiceDTO invoiceDTO)
      Adds a new invoice to the system.
      Parameters:
      invoiceDTO - The data transfer object containing the details of the invoice to be added.
      Returns:
      The added invoice as a InvoiceDTO object.

    • getInvoices

      List<InvoiceDTO> getInvoices(InvoiceFilter invoiceFilter)
      Retrieves a list of invoices based on the specified filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      invoiceFilter - The filter criteria for retrieving invoices, represented by an InvoiceFilter object.
      Returns:
      A list of invoices matching the filter criteria, each represented as an InvoiceDTO object.

    • getInvoiceById

      InvoiceDTO getInvoiceById(long id)
      Retrieves a specific invoice by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the invoice to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The invoice as an InvoiceDTO object.

    • removeInvoiceById

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> removeInvoiceById(long id)
      Removes an invoice from the system by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the invoice to be removed.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the result of the deletion operation. A 204 NO CONTENT status is returned on successful deletion.

    • updateInvoice

      InvoiceDTO updateInvoice(long invoiceId, InvoiceDTO sourceInvoiceDTO)
      Updates an existing invoice with new details.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The unique identifier of the invoice to be updated.
      sourceInvoiceDTO - The data transfer object containing the updated details of the invoice.
      Returns:
      The updated invoice as an InvoiceDTO object.

    • getInvoiceStatistics

      InvoiceStatisticDTO getInvoiceStatistics()
      Retrieves invoice statistics including the total amount for the current year, all-time total amount, and count of invoices.
      Returns:
      An InvoiceStatisticDTO object containing the invoice statistics.
